modName: The Ohmes - a lore-friendly race mod UNP CBBE
summary: This mod is reasonably lore-friendly. I\'ve done my best to represent the Ohmes as depicted in rough Elder Scrolls concept art. This is a suitable race for those who don\'t care for the overtly catlike Khajiit or my still quite furry Ohmes-Raht mod.
descriptionHtml:
[center][IMG]http://i48.tinypic.com/1115yrn.gif[/IMG][/center]

[b][size=16]The Ohmes Khajiit:[/size][/b]
The mysterious people of Elsweyr introduced to Skyrim.

From the arid deserts of Elsweyr, far away in the southern lands of Tamriel, come the fierce and noble Ohmes. Nomadic peoples, experts of mercantile and gifted in the ways of the tooth and the tongue, noone can say if they are more mer or cat.

This mod is reasonably lore-friendly. I\'ve done my best to represent the Ohmes as depicted in rough Elder Scrolls concept art. This is a suitable race for those who don\'t care for the overtly catlike Khajiit or [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/18418]my still quite furry Ohmes-Raht mod[/url]. It also serves as an excellent companion to that mod.

[b]~ FEATURES:[/b]
There are two versions of Ohmes females. How to recognize them in character select:
[ul]
[*]Ohmes - UNPB
[*]Ohmes Nomad - CBBE
[/ul]
New racial ability: [i]Ahnassi\'s Wisdom[/i]. Grants a bonus to Barter and Speechcraft for 30 seconds.

[b]~ INSTALLATION:[/b]
Unpack the zip and copy the files into your /skyrim/Data/ folder. Alternately, use the Nexus Mod Manager.

[b]~ NOTES:[/b]
Although this race is self-contained and will not affect your vanilla races, it is recommended that you load the esp after anything else that might affect bodies/faces. For example, Extended Slider Colors may conflict with any custom race.

Khajiit hairs sometimes appear in character menu.

[b]~ CHANGELOG:[/b]
1.1 Fixed UNP version. They were standing still. Now they move again!

[b]~ PLANNED UPDATES:[/b]
Improve textures. They could still use a little finesse.
Add body tattoos, possibly as optional textures. I\'d like to extend the concept of marking themselves to look like cats beyond the face.

[b]~ CREDITS:[/b] 
angelmeats - Engineering, texture editing

[b]~ RESOURCE CREDITS (Portions of creators\' works used in the creation of this race):[/b]
Asterai - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/5722]catface tattoos[/url].
RAN46 - For his always popular [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/7127]head mesh[/url].
Dimon - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/6461]UNP Dimonized[/url] body.
calyps - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/14899]UNP Blessed[/url] body.
Caliente - [url=http://skyrim.nexusmods.com/mods/2666]CBBE female body[/url] and the amazing BodySlide utility.

[b]~ COMPLAINTS AND BUG REPORTS:[/b]
angelmeats(at)gmail - or leave a message on the forum.
author: angelmeats
